name: WP ReadRemaining
author: Thomas H.

sections.description:
A pluginized version of ReadRemaining.js

Tell your readers how long they’ll need to get through all of your gibberish, with this clever jQuery plugin. With WP ReadRemaining TL;DR is a thing of the past.

Personalized – The time is estimated based on the user scrolling speed Non-Annoying – It is set to appear only when the user is actually reading.
Fully customizable – Bold Comic Sans? No problem, just set the css. But… why?
Flexible layout – Takes into account text, images or even videos.

short_description: This WordPress plugin allows you to show the user how long it will take to read the article considering the speed in which the user is scrolling.
